tossupQ:
LIFE SCIENCE Multiple Choice In pea plants, the yellow seed trait is completely dominant 
over the green seed trait. Suppose you cross a pea plant that is heterozygous [het-er-uh-ZY-
guhs] for the yellow seed trait with a pea plant containing green seeds. What colors of seed will 
the offspring have? 
 
W) Green 
X) Yellow 
Y) Half of the offspring will have green seeds and half will have yellow seeds 
Z) A seed color that is halfway between green and yellow
tossupA:
Y) HALF OF THE OFFSPRING WILL HAVE GREEN SEEDS AND HALF WILL HAVE 
YELLOW SEEDS
